pageTitle: Florel Fiskeri – Cottage Rental by Karup River, Jutland Denmark
heroText: Your tranquil holiday home in the forest – close to world‑class fishing in Denmark
aboutText: Florel Fiskeri is a cozy and modern cottage, tucked away in the woods by Denmark’s renowned Karup River. Perfect for families, couples, or keen anglers, the cottage sleeps up to 6 and offers all the comfort you need for a relaxing getaway.
aboutFeature4: Terrace with views of the lake
aboutFeature7: No smoking, pets by prior arrangement
areaText: Located in the beautiful Kompedal Forest, Florel Fiskeri offers direct access to unspoiled nature and some of Denmark’s best trout fishing:
areaFeature1: Karup River: Famous for big sea trout and fly fishing
areaFeature4: Swim or paddle in the nearby lake
areaFeature5: Just a short drive to Karup or historic Viborg
footerText: © 2025 Florel Fiskeri · Cottage rental by Karup River, Denmark · florelfiskeri.rf.gd
